website_summaries.verdict: A great wireless option that's worth the higher price for kids who regularly use headphones.
pros: Can be used with or without cord
30 foot Bluetooth range works well for kids who move while listening
cons: Volume may be difficult for some kids to adjust

customer_reviews.title: Functionally very good. But...
customer_reviews.text: Functionally these are very good. It has one button for power/pairing. We've never had any issues pairing with our iOS devices. Sound quality is good for the price. However the quality of the padding materials leave a lot to be desired. After about 14 months the soft material started to peel. Maybe we received one from a bad batch as I didn't see any other reviews with similar issues. Because it is out of warranty, customer service was no help. Note: volume limit only works when used with a cable. Bluetooth has no limit and can go pretty loud.
customer_reviews.author: fukuokakid

customer_reviews.title: Wish they'd lasted longer than a year...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these almost 1 year ago. They were fantastic for the first 9ish months. Then, they would not charge. Occasionally, the Bluetooth connection would be lost, but was fixed easily. I am disappointed that they did not make a full year. We also bought a second set (in purple) and those seem to be doing well so far. My children are 4 and 8, and they fit their heads well and were easy to use. Update 2/20/17: customer service contacted me (without prompt) and offered to send me a replacement headphone set! We have a new set that is in full working order and couldn't be happier. Thank you to Lil' Gadgets for still valuing the customer!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Ruholt

customer_reviews.title: Wish they had lasted a full year
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy last August when I purchased these headphones. The quality was superb and the company seemed to really care about its customers. Unfortunately, my 10 year old girl reported to me that they stopped working. They wouldn't charge and therefore will not power on. I was really bummed because the company had a stellar reputation for quality. I'm hopeful that my next purchase will not lead to the same end. It's very hard to find good quality products nowadays and when you find a company that cares, as a consumer, you stick with that company.
customer_reviews.author: JGuy

customer_reviews.title: So Far. So Good.
customer_reviews.text: 7/23/2018 - So, I ordered these headphones depsite the negative reviews I saw regarding quality and longevity. The overwhelming positive reviews and apparent top-notch customer service convinced me. We are literally on day one with one pair. Another pair for my other kid arrives tomorrow. So far, they are great. Packaging was simple and nice. Pairing with my kid's Kindle Fire via Bluetooth was a BREEZE. The headphones came charged (to a point) as mentioned in the Quick Start. They worked awesome for my kid tonight and are conveniently plugged in and charging right now. I'll update.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to setup and our kiddo had no problem figuring out the controls. Sound is good and the mic pick ups voice during Zoom calls. Kiddo says they are comfortable and we like the fact that there is no cord to pull or chew on (yes, our kid chews on headphone cords - no, we don’t know why - yes, it’s weird). Thumbs up and worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: KCH

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bluetooth headphones for kids
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two pair of these for my granddaughter and grandson for a plane trip. They were lifesavers. They very easily connected to their Amazon tablets, no cords or wires necessary, and we weren't constantly telling them to turn down the volume on their tablets. The youngest is just turning 4 and normally doesn't like headphones over her ears. She said these were comfortable and she kept them on instead on taking them on and off. I would definitely recommend these and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Love A Rainy Day

customer_reviews.title: Good product how after being used by my son and ...
customer_reviews.text: Good product how after being used by my son and daughter for 6 months, the cable on the right side starts burning. I've bought three of these and they all fail the same way. Quite dangerous as it can be a source of fire for the house Please improve on that otherwise take off market
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Great, but battery/bluetooth doesn't hold
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a pair of these for my older daughter to use with her iPad on the plane and needed a second for our younger daughter - same purpose. The headphones are great, but the battery wouldn't hold a charge and bluetooth just didn't work. The wire was also broken so we have had to use another wire. We wanted these because they were wireless, so having to use a (different) wire has sort of defeated the purpose for us. I also purchased these a while back and never posted a review since these issues were instantaneous. So, I am on the fence about these headphones. 1 set has been great for 2 years, and 1 set has been unreliable.
customer_reviews.author: B. P.

customer_reviews.title: Won't hold charge; can only use wired
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement. The first volume button didn't work. The first didn't hold a charge, but thought it was just a defective headset. Second doesn't hold a charge either. We charge it fully. Son will use it wireless for a 30 minute program. I'll turn off the power, then put away. When I pick it up the next day or even later the same day (after power was off since last use), and no charge remains. We need to pull out the wire. Repeated this several times to make sure we didn't accidentally leave the power on. Yet, same issue every time for entire month. We missed the return window after weeks of flu in our home. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kept my kid entertained!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones, it worked in our favor during a 9+ hour flight! Pros: -good fit -long battery life -volume is limited but audio sounds acceptable -comes with protective bag and cables for charging and headphone -seems sturdy and only time will tell -easy to pair and use the physical keys, very nice that volume can not be easily enabled by the little fingers Cons: -pricing initially but since the pros outweighs most cons it is worth the cost -on ear can cause your kids ear to heat up, sweat so check periodically for breaks -can not connect or switch on multiple devices or at least my quick attempt failed
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones, died after almost a year.
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome and great, easy to use, kid loves them, etc... But they basically stopped working after almost exactly a year (2 weeks short of a year, to be exact). We take good care of them and they are twice as costly as their other model, so I'm disappointed they didn't last longer. *Update: As a response to my review, the company replaced the headphones at no cost and let me keep the old ones as "back up" which we have used occasionally with the share port & friends. Awesome customer service, which we so appreciate! **UPDATE: The replacement headphones have also stopped working after a couple months. Ugh. I'm kinda annoyed.
customer_reviews.author: S. Nikhanj

customer_reviews.title: Great for family on the go
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are worth the money for sure. We have used these headphones a lot in the last 4 months. They are easy to set up and to charge. They are durable and comfortable. My 5 year old loves these. So worth the money to not have to deal with cords. This company has AMAZING customer service too! I had an issue with a different corded set of headphones from this company and they were great to work with. They go above and beyond to take care of their customers! I would buy these headphones again or give them as a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Mama221

customer_reviews.title: Quality option for smaller ears
customer_reviews.text: Good for kids or adults with small heads/ears. Sound quality is excellent for a less expensive set of headphones. Very solid and substantial feel. Since earpads and overall headset are small, they squeeze in on ears a little bit. These probably will not cover the whole ear on a child or adult. They are a different style than that...lower profile option. I use them for casual listening and working out. They are not really light enough for running or hopping around.
customer_reviews.author: JT Shop

customer_reviews.title: Big disappointment for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a 4 hour plane ride and she couldn't use them. They weren't loud enough. Kept them because we are in the car quite a bit and I thought maybe just the airplane noise was the problem. She's been trying to use them for a few months now but they just aren't loud enough. We have to turn our radio off just so she can hear the sound (and that's is with them turned up all the way). Big disappointment for the price. Wish I had returned them immediately. Maybe we just got a lemon :(
customer_reviews.author: mommasshopping

customer_reviews.title: Amazing company!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are great! Very durable. My son throws them constantly and has had his for about a year and they finally broke (lasted way longer than I thought they would) and I called the company and they are replacing them even though they aren't under warranty anymore! Seriously fantastic! We have 2 pair, one for the 6 year old and one for the 2year old. Fit both kids great and the noise canceling is just enough to make crowds and noisy places tolerable for our son with autism but not so much that he can't hear at all. It's perfect!! I won't use any other headphones for our kids now.
customer_reviews.author: Cb

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones for our toddler
customer_reviews.text: We're planning a trip that involves 11+ hour plane rides, so having headphones for the little one is a MUST. We tried three different kinds, and he hated all of them, but these, he tolerates. They're also loud enough so he's able to actually hear the sound when in a noise restaurant (which is where we tested them) or later on the airplane. Will report back after they're battle and plane ride tested, but we think they'll do fine. UPDATE: They worked amazing on the intercontinental plane ride, too. Our little guy loved them.
customer_reviews.author: M. Goerg

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: This is our 3rd pair of headphones from lilgadgets. My daughter is starting 3rd grade and has used these for her school the last few years. I like that they protect her ear from the volume creeping up. She likes the colors. We both appreciate that they don't break easily. so far they have been good quality for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: 5 years later - still awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these headphones for my then 4 y/o granddaughter, based on great reviews here on Amazon and elsewhere. She loved them then and still does now at age 9. We're very impressed with the audio quality, speed of charging, and durability of these headphones. If and when they ever conk out, we'll immediately buy a new pair of LilGadgets Untangled. And, now that she has a younger sister, there's no doubt we'll need another pair soon anyway, to avert a serious case of sibling jealousy. :)
customer_reviews.author: Lil One

customer_reviews.title: Not noise canceling
customer_reviews.text: This headset is an ok headset. I like that it can be wireless and links to our devices fine. Volume is loud enough if in a quiet enough room but it’s not noise canceling in anyway so if you are in a noisy place, you will not hear from your headset that well. I bought this for my autistic daughter specifically for the noise canceling and for her to be able to watch her videos if we bring her to a noisy place. The noise canceling helps keep her sane. Unfortunately this is the only kids headset that supposedly does this but it’s not very good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Updated after Support Contact.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy materials, worked great for 5 months. All of a sudden sounds died and can barely hear anything. Submitted warranty info on their website, said I would hear back within 24 hours. I haven't heard from them in a week. Update: Spoke with support, they replied, but I never received the email. Seems the head phones have a volume controller in the media rocker by holding it in a direction. Held it up and the volume came back up. With this resolved I would upgrade to 4 out 5 stars, as the instructions are not clear about volume control, but they are still working amazingly.
customer_reviews.author: Serincino

customer_reviews.title: Power button fail, not worth the $
customer_reviews.text: While the sound and battery life are great, the power button is a major downfall. Sometimes it works, sometimes it doesn’t. My 7 year old has a hard time getting them powered on so he asks us to do it and you have to press really hard and hold for about 7 seconds. I’ve emailed the manufacturer and haven’t gotten a response. Not worth $49 in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: BuddingBeader

customer_reviews.title: lacks auto off feature and lacks on/off indicator light
customer_reviews.text: these headphones seem to have a quality build, but the lack of an auto off feature (or even just a small indicator light to tell the kid that they left their headphones on) makes them an unpractical choice. my 10 year old daughter likes the headphones, but the battery is dead every time she goes to use them. to turn off, the user must hold down the power button until an LED flashes. just looking at the headphones, there is no way to tell if they are powered up or not.
customer_reviews.author: M. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 3yo for upcoming international trip, but found myself letting her use them in the morning in bed. They are a teeny bit big, but my tot is the size of a 18mo-24mo. She loves them and I love that they do not get too loud. They are very easy to use. I would give them 5 stars but to be honest the plastic feels a bit cheap and flimsy - I don't have a lot of faith if they were dropped a time or two that they wouldn't crack.
customer_reviews.author: LBTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Sound only works on one side.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to accompany my 2 going on 3 year olds son Kindle I bought him for Christmas. He only uses the set for half an hour daily to listen to and play Spanish games. So it does not get much wear-and-tear at all. However, the headphones have torn and currently only have sound coming through one side. This is unacceptable for a $50 pair of child sized headphones. I would really like to exchange these. And would be glad if the company would get back to me with an option.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Houston

customer_reviews.title: Headphones won't charge after 4 months.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 4 year old daughter. I liked that the volume limits to 93db. Gotta protect the little ones hearing! They seemed to fit nicely and were padded in all the right places. No issues with slipping off her ears. Bought these as a birthday present about 5 months early so they stayed packaged until she was ready for them. About 4 months of less than average use, the headphones would no longer hold charge. The connection was good and they would charge but minutes after unplugging they would die. They are a little pricey for only 4 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle W

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought the Kidrox headphones but they did not work S they were supposed to. So I looked at these next for my 3 year old. They are twice the price of the other ones we returned, and they are worth every penny. We love these. They are light, great sound, and fit my 3yr old perfectly. The only criticism I have is that I wish the sound was capped at 85db instead of 93db. Little kids should be restricted to 85db and below. Anything above can damage hearing. We limit the volume through the device we are streaming sound from.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Durable and practical
customer_reviews.text: These are great kid headphones! My older daughter got hers 3 years ago and they are still in great shape. My 4 year old just got hers and loves them too! A little difficult for the little ones to work the small on/off and volume switches but by 5 all kids are completely independent. Great for volume control as kids’ shoes vary in volume and my kids love to crank up the volume on their device. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Curry

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Simply put, we got exactly what we expected. But if I'm truly picky I'd add that the quality of the materials was actually BETTER than expected. My daughter is happy and this will definitely be a life saver over the coming holiday. No more tangled cables with earphones that aren't the right size for her! Given 5 starts on noise cancellation and sound quality as well although let's be clear hear I am not comparing these to headsets intended for adults. They do more than what most parents would expect at the price, hence 5 starts.
customer_reviews.author: Vitruvian Man

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! My 4 year old daughter had gone through about three other headsets because they were made cheaply and not to withstand the hands of a 4 year old! I decided to spend a little more and these were worth the price. Very sturdy and well made, nicely padded, and she loves the pretty purple color. Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy headphones for clumsy kids like mine.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my kids to use during online learning. Unfortunately we live in a small space where they have to be in the same room together during distance learning and they tend to get distracted hearing the commotion of each other's meetings. These headphones are great! They don't cancel out noise much,so you can still hear what's going on around you with them on, but they definently do the job. I Definitely like that they are built very sturdy. My kids tend to break things easily and i have bought some that didn't last a week due to them being mostly flimsy plastic.
customer_reviews.author: angelina garcia

customer_reviews.title: Really small on ears
customer_reviews.text: I am on the fence on these, they were a lot of money and my GD doesn't seem to like them because they are too small and hurt her ears. I threw the box away so can't send them back or I would. She likes the wireless feature and they were easy to sync up to her tablet. The pads do seem like they would tear up easily if you're not careful with them. Overall, I just wasn't happy with them for that much money.
customer_reviews.author: Str8kuntry

customer_reviews.title: Good kids bluetooth headphones
customer_reviews.text: 2 months in and my 5 year old still loves them. We found a matching Unikittie phone case! They seem best for short wear tho.. She complains about the pads hurting her ears after a bit. I wish the offered an over the ear option and not just these as an on ear option. They hold a charge well and are sturdy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Paris

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: With most kids headsets costing 30 dollars less, this is horrible quality for the price. Purchased it two years ago but didn’t start using it since pandemic, the coating worn off in 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: Yc

customer_reviews.title: 2nd pair of headphones that stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth has problems connecting if not fully charged. Everything else is good. Update: So I ordered a second pair within a year of buying the first and now the second pair have stopped working within 2 months of me purchasing them. I loved how they sounded and my boys really liked them but $50 is too much to pay for headphones if they aren't going to last longer than two months. Very dissapointed and most likely will not be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: larisa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of those for my twins. We love it. It can be used wireless, with bluetooth, or with an audio cable. The quality is good, light weight, nice colors. I like the audio cable option, it doesn't have to be charged, and the cable can be replaced. It has been my biggest problem with previous purchases. Kids tried the sharing port, where you plug an audio cable between 2 headsets, they liked it. I'm very satisfied with my purchase. I purchased separate USB chargers, with the same specs as the headsets, making charging an easy task when kids want to use bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Stephane Rossan

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the $50
customer_reviews.text: Originally, I was quite convinced at the sheer number of positive responses. After receiving 2 sets, I'm sorely disappointed. Like a few other reviewers have said, the volume is far too low to hear anything over ambient noise unless you're in a very quiet room. Cars and airplanes will down out any amount of volume. Additionally, the Bluetooth is spotty at best. One of the headsets doesn't pair with anything (I can't pair it to anything) and the other requires a fair bit of finagling. TLDR: Don't bother with these. There are many other headphones/earbuds that will work much better than the $50/pair that I paid for these. These are being returned.
customer_reviews.author: westptx

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a few months...
customer_reviews.text: I bout 4 pairs of these head phones at $40 some dollars each. They didn’t have as much volume control as I had hoped for little ears. But also, I’ve had them since March, and the green ones stopped working. They just won’t turn on. It’s a bummer. At this price, there should be no problems with them.
customer_reviews.author: Sharleen Vertullo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphones
customer_reviews.text: It is 2018 and this headphones are still working like the first day. My daughter uses it every day to this day. What an amazing equipment. Thanks LilGadgets! Nice job! ======================================= I bought this headphones in October 2014. What an excellent headphones. It was a gift to my then 13 YO daughter. It survives her and still today November 2016 is in heavy use. This piece of equipment has survived two submersion in water; once in a pool and once in the beach. In both cases my daughter forgot about them. I dried them and no problem. They dismembers but I put it back as new. Nice sound and no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Morales

customer_reviews.title: Right product, right price.
customer_reviews.text: My 7 y/o daughter loves her headphones. We've had a few different types over the past two years, and these are by far her favorite. Even after a month, she insists on wearing them around the house when she's not even listening to anything. I cannot comment on the sound quality (they're kid sized and I've got a big noggin...), but I've not heard any complaints either. It seems LilGadgets is an Amazon-only brand, but I'm very happy with both the support (they contacted me shortly after delivery to make sure there were no problems or questions) and product quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Woods

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: As stated in the headline, these headphones were exactly what I was looking for to use with my children's tablets. I got them because they have a slightly higher top volume than other choices on the market. This is ideal because they'll be using them on a plane as we travel later this spring. Additionally, I like that you can use these as blue tooth or wired and with the wired option, you can daisy chain the headphones together.
customer_reviews.author: Eric J Dahl

customer_reviews.title: Love 'Em!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old son loves loves loves his headphones! I purchased these about a month ago, and my family couldn't be happier! They have connected to our tablet with no problems and the sound is actually pretty decent. I find the volume protection a wonderful safety feature, and they have proven to be durable so far as they have been dropped a number of times with no damage. The headband and the earphones are soft and comfortable, and the color is true to what I viewed in the picture before purchase. I also love that they are "little kid" sized and fit nicely on his head. Awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphones for kids
customer_reviews.text: After countless broken wired headsets I moved to these for all my kids a few years ago - they love them! Comfortable enough to wear for hours on long road trips. Sound is good and volume limit nice bonus protection for little ears. I've contacted their support twice and couldn't be happier with the service I received. Excellent product, awesome company - definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my SPD Little
customer_reviews.text: My 8yo Daughter has sensory processing needs and is affected by overstimulation. She enjoys watching shows and listening to audiobooks, but I hesitated to get her anything that wasn't created with some sound limitations. We found these and fell in love. She's not yet ready for bluetooth, can't quite stay patient enough for the pairing - but she's using the cord and port and she has felt like there is so much freedom to be able to manage her own entertainment. :D Perfect for long trips!
customer_reviews.author: Mury2202

customer_reviews.title: Broke after three weeks!
customer_reviews.text: These were great headphones until they broke after just a few weeks!! If you buy them, definitely get the protection plan. Sure wish we had. Going to stick to cheaper headphones for the kids from now on. My daughter takes good care of her things so I know this was not her fault. Just a bum set of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn K

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Child Headphones! Worth Every Penny!
customer_reviews.text: I ADORE THESE HEADPHONES! I was thrilled to find these! I love the Bluetooth option, and the fact that you can still plug them in if necessary. They come with a carrying case which is nice for keeping cords together during travel. Color was great, they fit my 3 year old very well. I bought another brand for my son as they were completely out of stock in the other colors and I was very disappointed. These have the noise control features, but you can still easily hear your media during an airplane ride. I have purchased two other types of kids head phones and both have had extremely poor sound quality and fit.
customer_reviews.author: lillady977

customer_reviews.title: good for small kids only
customer_reviews.text: Size : good for small kids only. Co-founder states in Q&A that : "Looking at them straight on and envisioning them as a circle, the diameter is about 6.5". However, each ear cup extends down an additional 1.5".". It's not true. The ear cups diameter is 6.5cm flat, no more. I was hoping for 8cm as stated, but it's not the case. Sound: sound quality is OK, but sound volume is very low, which makes it challenging to use on airplanes where there is some background noise.
customer_reviews.author: Arnaud V.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stand the test of time !!
customer_reviews.text: This product worked very well when new. we used it mostly when flying, so not so often. My daughter loved them , and the sound was good. Noise cancellation was fair. However, after 6 months, the battery would no longer hold a charge. It would show fully charged, but die within two minutes of use. So, based on that, I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: B. MacKinnon

customer_reviews.title: You won’t regret buying them
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a pink set of these a couple years ago for my niece, then later my son and still later for my nephew. I think they are great quality for kids headphones. The sound is clear, some kids headphones you can barely hear anything. It’s durable, comfortable (I tried them on), adjustable (slightly hard to adjust), and I love that they are wireless. Great headphones to take on an airplane, my kid had no trouble hearing his tablet. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: BrennaLynn

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: I almost returned these because I could not get them to pair with my iPad (tip - hold the button down until you see it connect to your device in your Bluetooth settings, don’t click the button several times). Now that they are pairing smoothly, I’m pretty happy with the purchase. The one negative thing is fit...my son has a big head and they don’t cover his ears all the way. But, it doesn’t seem to bother him and I can’t hear the device. So win, win. I also love knowing he won’t hurt his ears and the wireless feature is a plus as well.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Happy with product!
customer_reviews.text: Received & tried them today- seem pretty sturdy. Bluetooth connection was simple and quick, quality of sound is good and with just a few buttons it's easy for kids to use. I wish the headphones had volume control, other than that, they work well. There are a few options for adjusting the fit & it's nice that they came with the pouch for carrying them around/storage. Would recommend product!
customer_reviews.author: Liz L

customer_reviews.title: Great Product & Amazing Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The head phones are great. Pairs easily. Good quality equipment and accessories. My son loves them and they have a volume limiter so that he can unintentionally blast his ears out. We had an issue with charging that was immediately handled by customer service. Zero hassle. I recommend this product to anyone with a child who needs a head set for school or entertainment.
customer_reviews.author: Reza Bahador

customer_reviews.title: A+ customer service
customer_reviews.text: The Bluetooth (to iPad mini 4) worked intermittently. Because the connection wasn’t consistent, we allowed our 5 year old to plug the headset into headphone jack. That was a BIG mistake because now the headphone pin is stuck in the headphone jack. That means no sound from the iPad—it’s stuck on headphone mode. I would NOT buy this again. I’m surprised that the ratings were so good on this item. Update: 4/4/2018: Superior customer service. LilGadgets contacted me after my initial review and resolved all my concerns. Very impressive, to say the least. And, we love our replacement headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Alisarue

customer_reviews.title: We love lil gadgets!! 6 years strong now...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased lil gadgets wireless headphones initially for our 2year old just over 5 years ago and while worn and slightly frayed, they still work great. She is now 7, and with distance learning in place, we wanted to get her a fresh, updated pair. We love them. They’re strong, soft, and have great volume control. We love that they’re so versatile. We can use the wire, or without. They charge quickly and last for hours! The green color she picked out is just beautiful. The main reason we went with this brand was the volume limit, comfort/fit, and just overall quality! This company strives for excellence! Loyal customer here.
customer_reviews.author: Renee A.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Little Ears
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old son got these for all the flights he takes with his mom and I and he LOVES them. Uses them at home when watching videos or when practicing his piano. He loves these things. They aren't too loud that they could hurt his hearing, either
customer_reviews.author: Steven Bender

customer_reviews.title: For this past Christmas we got our ten year old a nice set of Beats
customer_reviews.text: We've had these for a year now. We got these right around my daughter's 3rd birthday, and she's almost 4 now. She throws them, they've been dropped, worn around her belly (stretched), etc etc... basically she's battle tested the heck out of em and they're still going strong. For this past Christmas we got our ten year old a nice set of Beats, and they stopped working about a month ago, and they each had some nice Skullcandy ones before that lasted maybe six months. The only drawback is sometimes her hair gets wrapped around where the earpiece connects to the headband piece.
customer_reviews.author: Jason S.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Never was able to hook to WiFi. Bought for my grandkids. Have other ear buds and earphones all work with WiFi. These work when plugged directly into iPad but no WiFi. Waste of money. Bought cheaper ones that work all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie F

customer_reviews.title: Issue fixed!!!! :)
customer_reviews.text: Update - after reading some of the reviews and the product description I realized there was a one year warranty. I contacted the company for help and within 48 hrs I had a new one in my mailbox. The customer service was amazing. Thanks Lil Gadgets and CS Jacquie! So disappointed...I bought this same version for my daughter awhile ago and was excited to finally order them for my son when we were headed on a trip. His worked perfectly for a but only for a short period of time. It lasted about 5 months before they stopped working. I’ve tried everything to troubleshoot, even tried using the wire for plug in ones.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine

customer_reviews.title: Just like the description. Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with our order. My son is only 18 month and these headphones will be something he’ll be able to use for the next couple years. I love that there is volume control to protect his little ears. Great color and comes with a nice bag to keep the headphones when not in use. Overall happy with my order
customer_reviews.author: Leena

customer_reviews.title: fits well
customer_reviews.text: I am an adult with a small head. These fit me perfectly as i had hoped. They did not cancel outside noise as I expected. But the sound was nice. The instruction manual was too brief and it is not intuitive on how to turn it on and off and how to change tracks.
customer_reviews.author: Demiser

customer_reviews.title: Awesome headphones for kids
customer_reviews.text: These can take a beating. We are on our 4th pair of these headphones. 2nd set per kid. The younger the child, the harder they seem to be on them. But these headphones hold up for close to a year with 3 year old manhandling. My 7 year old has had her recent set for almost 2 years and they are still going strong. I love the bluetooth feature because my kids like to mess with the cords and would ruin the cheaper walmart type corded headsets within months. Definitely recommend these. Easy to use for my kids and love the volume control.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly F.

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Purchased for my petite 3 year old. They fit her perfect. She’s able to connect to her iPhone on her own. The battery last for days and charges completely within a few hours. The sound quality is as good as my $250 headphones. Would recommend to anyone looking for Bluetooth headphones for a toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Sandie Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Wireless doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: We bought these specifically for the wireless feature and are disappointed that they don't work well wireless. They disconnect within the same room if you get too far from your device. This defeats the purpose for us. Will look on Wirecutter for a better brand.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Great products, EXCELLENT customer service!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these headphones, but this review is based more on the company’s customer service; it’s excellent!! Long story short, I had an issue with 2 of my Untangled Pro headphones. I emailed their support department and within a few hours I received a response from Stephanie. After a short conversation, Stephanie told me that LilGadgets stands strongly behind their 100% satisfaction guarantee and would try to resolve my problem as best they can. I received a 2nd email from Stephanie, and to my surprise, she said she would be sending me 2 new units! Talk about excellent customer service!! It obviously shows this company really cares about its customers. Thank you Stephanie!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: The volume up/down buttons on the headphones don't work very well. It is a shame that you need to spend over $100 even for kids' headphones, but, I think that is the case. I have a pair of $300 Sony headphones that I love- just don't want to pay that much for kids' ones!
customer_reviews.author: Charles McClelland

customer_reviews.title: My 2 year old loves them
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are wonderful. I was afraid it will be too big for my 2.25 year old who hates wearing any headbands, but it fits nicely with room to grow. When I first put it on her, she tried to pull it off, thinking it's another cute headband that mom tries to force onto her, but then I told her that's how you'll hear sound and she kept them on. She kept it on until I took it off after 30 minutes. We're going on a 6 hour flight so these will be great for her to hear her audio on the plane.
customer_reviews.author: kayni

customer_reviews.title: Work well but at the price would expect better quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 pairs Dec 2018, one for each child. Less than 6 months later the set my oldest child used would not longer Bluetooth pair. After troubleshooting with support they were determined to be defective and new headset was issued without question. About a year after that the new headset would no longer power on. They work when wired to a device and do seem to accept a charge but won't power on. The other set (used by a younger child) has worked without issue.
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones for kids
customer_reviews.text: Good headphones for kids, I like that they come with a bag. Worked very well on the flight. I them misplaced them after the trip, and 4 days later was wondering why there was no audio in my child's tablet. It was still sending it to the headphones. They had been on 4 days and were still working. They are comfortable enough that while traveling my child felt comfortable enough wearing them around their neck while they fell asleep. I have already recommended them to a couple people
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: could use some tweaking
customer_reviews.text: This is a good concept, but the single power button makes it frustrating for the lil one. my other gripe is that they are a thicker unit and headphones don't twist for slimmer storage like the Puro Otherwise a decent unit for the price
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Not loud enough for use on an airplane-
customer_reviews.text: We bought these specifically for use on an airplane. So that was a bust. Otherwise, they are comfortable enough and adjustable. Not sure what makes these headphones so much more expensive than other brands but I did not find justification for the cost. I will likely try to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Amy F.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality. Have had for years
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny. Awesome quality. Have had for 4 months. We went through a few pairs of cheaper headphones that broke. These will not break. Wireless, but have wire in case you need it. Comfy ear pieces. Even fits hubby and me. Really convenient - I actually use them to do dishes and listen to an audio book or watch shows on my tablet. Can't say enough good things about them. Customer service is great too. Updated years later. We are now purchasing another pair for my son. Still worth it. Headphones can be connected too, so if the kiddos are watching a video together, can be connected. These headphones ROCK.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Yego

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME HEADPHONES
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! Bought for traveling with my 5-year old twin nieces and was the perfect choice! The girls could watch the sample thing on one Ipad and each wear there own head phones or watch something separately on two Ipads. These were durable, comfortable and the volume control was a must. Easy for the kids to use and understand. Fit them perfectly! If you're looking for headphones for your kids, look no further. It was convenient you could listen via bluetooth or wired in case they ran out of charge.
customer_reviews.author: Kal

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones and Seller is quite good and keeping promises.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these last year and the little ones loved it. I love that you can use it wirelessly and wired as well. On long trips, my little ones complain that it feels tight around their heads but them but nothing intolerable. My 5-star rating has to do with the seller. I had an issue with one set and informed Jacquie. She told me that I had a one year warranty and if the problem persisted, it would be replaced. Well, a few months later one side of the headphone completely stopped working. Once I informed Jacquie, she quickly sent out a new pair, which was very much appreciated. Because of the this, will definitely purchase another Lilgadgets again.
customer_reviews.author: NYC Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and easy to setup.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup on both android phone and tablet, comfortable for my 3.5 year old. Sounds quality is really good and the max volume safety feature is very reassuring and works well. I didn't consider the car seat headrest side clearance so it took some coaxing to get my son used to not having much room to move his head side to side. Although after further consideration there may be a small safety risk associated with a child wearing these in the car seat. After realizing this, we switched to an in-ear bud style for road trips.
customer_reviews.author: Mason R

customer_reviews.title: does not work on my imac
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter who is 5 years old. They look and feel nice but are not compatible with our imac os x. You may have to do some updates for your driver depending on what type of operating system you have. However this works excellent with everything else and my daughter really loves it for her ipad. Customer service was very helpful. They did extensive research to help find the correct driver updates. And I highly recommend this product. Just make sure if you have an imac that your drivers are updated.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Pyon

customer_reviews.title: Good one connected
customer_reviews.text: These are nice, but there is always a hard time connecting to Bluetooth. Spend 20 Minutes to get hold the buttons properly and rub my stomach and stand on one leg and the get lucky each time we use them. Once connected no prob.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Love features — not sure it works as we intended
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 3 and a half year old daughter to use during air travel. We liked that the volume was controlled for safe listening. It may have been so controlled that it can’t be used on a plane because we couldn’t hear using it. We will try using it at home.
customer_reviews.author: KMorgan

customer_reviews.title: This is our second pair! Love!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my eldest daughter six years ago (When she was two)! She regularly uses them and they’re still going strong. Now purchased a second pair for my three year old son and they are just as awesome! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Apostol

customer_reviews.title: They survived an 1100 mile car trip!
customer_reviews.text: Let's just say these survived a 19 hour, 1100 mile car trip with 2x 3 year olds and a 5 year old. These hold up well. They do have a slightly "cheaper" feel to them - however, they are durable and work really well. If you find they do not "connect" sometimes - they do "fall asleep" so just be sure to hold the power button for 2 seconds to get them to power back up and pair.
customer_reviews.author: ErikGoBlue

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, Great Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones worked perfectly for my 4 year old grandson for 2 months until the plastic piece holding the ear piece to the headpiece broke (the reason for 4 stars, not 5). I wrote to customer service and was provided with a new set of headphones with lightning speed. Assuming that this doesn't become a persistent problem, what more can you ask for? The headphones performed as expected, mechanical or technical problems reported in other reviews. For now, the product gets 3 stars, customer services gets 5. Assuming these don't break, I will be an extremely satisfied customer both with the product and the company!
customer_reviews.author: K. LAFAVE

customer_reviews.title: These are the best headphones we’ve ever had
customer_reviews.text: These are the best headphones we’ve ever had!! There are so many pros: 1. Great/fun color options! 2. volume limiting! 3. A HUGE selling factor for us was that you can use them either wirelessly OR you have the option to use them with a cord! These is so great if you forget to charge them up before a trip! 4. durable! Our kids are pretty hard on stuff and these still look perfect 9 months later! I highly recommend these if you are wanting headphones for your kids!!!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew King

customer_reviews.title: All around fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Amazing headphones. The battery life is fantastic and will last for days. I purchased 3 sets for my 3 kids and took them on an 11 day trip to England. Setup was easy, and we didn't need to charge at all for the entire trip. They are more expensive than wired headphones, but I am hoping they will last longer. My kids have destroyed the jacks on prior headsets. Plus, the colors and design are great. My 3 year-old likes to wear them turned off to muffle sound while sleeping on long trips. With other headsets, the cushions fall off easily, but these cushions are snugly attached.
customer_reviews.author: Chris C.

customer_reviews.title: Disapointed
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these for our kids Christmas presents this last December and while one is still working (green one), the black one is already malfunctioning. It still works with Bluetooth, but my son likes to use the cord and it either only works thru one speaker or it is muffled and sounds bad. I tried different cords with the same results. The other one barely gets used, so I am not sure it will end up with the same issue. Overall the sound is decent and the fit is good, perfect for my 8 and 11 year olds, but for $50 I would have expected them to last longer than 4-5 months. A bit disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Szpak

customer_reviews.title: Love them & recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely recommend these for kids, the volume can go low & it can also go really loud as well, an adult can also use it, they come different colors the materiel is good quality & you can adjust to fit, great buy & worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kody

customer_reviews.title: Wish they would last longer
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 pairs of these for Christmas 2015. The first pair wouldn't hold a charge and therefore wouldn't turn on after 3 only months of normal use. I was able to get a replacement and it has been fine for a year now. The second pair is now doing the same thing - not holding a charge and won't turn on. Of course it's after the 1 year warranty so I have to buy another pair. My kids love these headphone and I love that they can't get too loud. I just wish they would last a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: d

customer_reviews.title: Great wireless product for kids!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our 5 year old for our upcoming trip to the Caribbean, which would involve a four and a half hour flight each way. This paired so easily with my son's iPad Mini and was comfortable for him to wear. I loved that it came with a cord so we could use it with the plane's entertainment system, and we would also be able to use the headphones if the battery needed to be recharged and we couldn't charge it mid-flight. The sound quality was great too - not just "good enough for kids." I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: NYMommy10

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 3 and 6 year old
customer_reviews.text: Trying to work from home while home schooling during this COVID pandemic has proven difficult. That was until these headphones. They are long lasting, easy to use, and so far kid proof. My boys absolutely adore these headphones. We are all able to sit at the table together now without being disturbed by the other's work/assignments/entertainment. Battery life so far has held up well and I fully recommend to anyone looking for some relief from all the NOISE.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Not just for kids!
customer_reviews.text: I will begin by saying I am an adult that wears hearing aids and enjoy wearing these wireless earphones while walking the dog. I enjoy listening to audio books without having to worry about getting tangled up with long wired earphones (I don't know why they make most cords so long). Setup was easy and earphones were comfortable even with hearing aids. So if you are an adult that has a small head go for them, no one will know they were made for children. Your grandchildren can use yours when they visit! It is nice that they come with a short cord when battery runs low. Quality, packaging and price are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty good. They sound great, look nice, and are pretty comfortable. My only problem is that they stopped working after about a week of having them. I charged them overnight, but they won't turn on anymore unless they're connected to the charger. I really like them though... At least they came with a cord. UPDATE: The company emailed me recently about the headphones and sent me a new pair for free. They were very kind, and the new pair works fine! UPDATE 2: Over a year later and I still love these headphones! They outlived the $200 Beats my friend got me for Christmas, and dozens of earbuds! If they ever die, I will be buying another pair!
customer_reviews.author: ally612

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and affordable
customer_reviews.text: This is our second pair. Love them. He has autism and has to have them to be in a public place. The blue is also his favorite color. They do last very well and connect to iPad or phone with ease.
customer_reviews.author: B hov

customer_reviews.title: Great great product. Delivers on all its promises
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. My daughter loves them. Can connect via Bluetooth or using a 3.5mm cable. Also have a “sharing port” so 2 kids can enjoy the same music or show at the same time, just by using again a 3.5mm standard cable... somebody used their brain on this one! :D
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio Gallegos

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality, color, and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I bought these Bluetooth wireless headphones for my 11 year old daughter for Christmas and she has now had some time to get some good use. I tested them out myself and found the sound quality to be excellent; very clear and with nice bass. I am very happy with these, and my daughter loves that they are in her favorite color, purple. Additionally, they are perfectly suited for smaller heads, and cushiony for comfort. I'm very happy with these headphones and would definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi C

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: This is our 4th set of headphones and let me say, I'm SO VERY PLEASED with these! They are built to handle kid hands and fit my 7 year old twin girls perfectly and might I add, the "style" made them happy as well... they're so picky at such a young age ;) The other headphones we tried broke at the hinge, and we don't need them to fold anyway. The other headphones we tried had horrible sound and wouldn't stay connected. Highly recommend these!!! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi H

customer_reviews.title: One of the best products on Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best designed, best working products I have ever bought at Amazon.com. This is the second one that we have purchased. We saw how well it worked with our 3 year old, so we bought this for our 6 year old. Easy set up. Connects seamlessly every time to the kids Kindle Fire Kids edition. Everything about this product is well made. Our kids have torn up other headsets, especially the around the earpieces. These have shown no wear with normal use. Even the audio cable is high quality (The Bluetooth works well, so I use the audio cable in my car to connect my cellphone with crappy Bluetooth). This is an incredible value.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My kiddo would absolutely listen to something at a deafening level given the opportunity and I love that these don’t allow that to happen
customer_reviews.text: The charge lasts a long time, and it paired seamlessly with my son’s iPad. There are some reviews that complain about the volume not going up high enough, but, that’s kind of the point! My kiddo would absolutely listen to something at a deafening level given the opportunity and I love that these don’t allow that to happen. Granted we’ve never used them on an airplane, but he’s never complained about the volume level on multiple cross country road trips.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Broken and Too late to return...very upset
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a Christmas present. Today is Christmas Day and there is no charger and the place where you would plug the charger into the headphones is completely broken out. So my child has a broken gift and the product says I'm too late to return or replace. This was obviously a defective item seeing as I bought a pair for my other child and they work fine. 1/5/16 - Amending review. I was able to contact the seller via email the day after Christmas and received a new pair of head phones yesterday. I'm still waiting to see how they last over an extended period of time, but the kids do love them!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Friddle

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for road trips for when my 2 1/2 year old watches movies on the I-Pad. They are very easy to pair to the IPad and were fit him perfect but will also grow with him. He was hesitant at wearing headphones, but will wear these because of the fun color. Will purchase another pair when my daughter gets to the age that would need them.
customer_reviews.author: Billie Hiatt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for elementary aged kids & great customer service
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for my daughters 3 years ago and they've used them a lot with their ipads. After 3 years, one of them won't hold a charge anymore and their awesome customer service is sending us a refurbished replacement (which they didn't have to do given the age of the headphones). Really nice - I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: K. Finnefrock

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: got them for my busy three year old daughter she likes to watch her shoes so they yell over mommy's shows so I thought we could compromise by getting her headphones. she loves them since they are her favorite color and they fit around her giant hair nicely ☺️☺️
customer_reviews.author: stasia

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: My disabled daughter needs this type of head phone And these are great!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy B. Marinuzzi

customer_reviews.title: Better than the rest!
customer_reviews.text: This is our favorite brand and style of bluetooth headphones and their customer service and 100% satisfaction guarantee on their products is top shelf. We have tried the JBL kids headphones but they did not hold up and they don’t compare to the quality and durability of the untangled pro. It might seem like an investment up front for a set of kids headphones but I would say that the trade off is you will not need to replace these as much as less expensive, other brands. Thanks for everything lil gadgets we are beyond satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: A L

product_meta.title: LilGadgets Untangled PRO Kids Premium Wireless Bluetooth Headphones with SharePort and Microphone (Children) - Pink
product_meta.description:
Color:PinkThe Untangled Pro is a beautifully crafted Bluetooth headphone, smartly designed for your family’s convenience. We wanted to eliminate the need for wires, giving children the freedom to move, and make everyone’s lives just a little bit more fun. 

 Features: 
LilGadgets SharePort
13db passive noise reduction 
Built-in 360 degree microphone 
High-quality polycarbonates and stainless steel 
Comfortable SoftTouch fabric 
4ft. premium nylon braided, 3.5mm audio cable with inline microphone 

Tech Specs: 
Volume limited to 93db 
Speaker Diameter: 40mm
Frequency Response: 20Hz – 20kHz 
Impedance: 30 ohms 
Bluetooth 4.0 (supports HSP, HFP, and A2DP/AVRCP profiles) 
Receiver range: approximately 30ft. 
Battery life: 12 hours listening and 180 hours standby 
Every purchase is backed by our 100% satisfaction guarantee and warranty. If you need any assistance, please feel free to reach out to us!

 In The Box: 
1. LilGadgets Untangled Pro Wireless Bluetooth Headphones with SharePort
2. LilGadgets Premium Nylon 3.5mm Audio Cable
3. LilGadgets Microfiber Headphones Travel Pouch 
4. LilGadgets Premium Nylon USB Cable 5. Instruction manual
feature_bullets: High quality, Bluetooth wireless headphones with built-in microphone, sized for kids 4+ and compatible with nearly all Bluetooth devices. Offered in six wonderful colors and now with our one-of-a-kind SharePort feature allowing one headphone to be connected wirelessly and others to daisy-chain so all listeners are untethered from the device.

Our ear pads and headbands are covered with our specially designed SoftTouch breathable mesh material for your child's comfort. And the ear pads are manufactured with children in mind -- we use some nifty engineering to make sure the earpads won't fall off.

Developed, designed, and tested with kids of all ages to ensure durability of the final product while maintaining style and comfort. Every headphone comes with our 100% LilGadgets Satisfaction Guarantee. We believe that you’ll love the way these look, sound, and feel.

12 hour battery life with a 180 hour standby. A USB charging cable is included to rejuice. A 3.5mm cable with inline microphone is included as well so even if you outlast the battery, you can still listen on them the old fashioned way. Every headphone also comes with a micro-fiber travel bag to make transporting easy and so you have something to clean your device screens.

For the Kids: A portion of each purchase goes towards bullying prevention and awareness in schools through partner organizations. Additionally, we minimize the environmental impact of LilGadgets through waste reduction, carbon offsets, and water cleaning projects to help keep the outdoors clean for our kids. Visit us at LilGadgets.com for more info!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars3,433 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
